generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, which is clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and marked with pedestrian crossings.
- building: A multi-story white building with windows and commercial signage is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Several trees with green foliage are present along the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass-covered areas and possibly dirt patches are visible on the left side of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a black car in the foreground, a silver car, and a black car ahead.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, showing green signals.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with an upward arrow is visible on the left side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- motorcycle: No motorcycles are visible in the image.
